content:
That's a great idea! I think I'll definitely explore some of the lesser-known trails and areas within Fushimi Inari Shrine. I'd love to hike up to the Okusha Shrine and take in the stunning views of Kyoto. And who knows, maybe I'll stumble upon some hidden gems along the way.

By the way, speaking of hidden gems, I remember discovering that amazing ramen shop in Kyoto during my solo trip. It was such a great find, and I'm still thinking about it to this day. Do you have any recommendations for other hidden gems in Kyoto, like secret gardens or lesser-known temples?
